channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report I-2024060066
item.description:
Report I-2024060066

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-28T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-16
  • City: Anchorage
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Water
  • Carrier/Reporter: TOTE MARITIME ALASKA, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On June 16, 2024, TAG inspected trailer V 007262, booking SEA 1031974. This load sailed NB on the Midnight Sun voyage 24093 that departed Tacoma on 6/12/2024. Upon inspecting it, TAG found undeclared hazardous items of 5 boxes of UN2735 Amines, Liquid Class 8 Corrosive. This item was not manifest or submitted for approval and the trailer sailed with undeclared hazardous material inside on the Vessel.
